import React, {useContext} from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import AppContext from '../provider/Context' function GradeDetail() { const {students} = useContext(AppContext); const {stdId} = useParams(); const getName = () => { return students.find((stu) => stu.studentId === stdId).name; } return (
